content: Ok, first, let's figure out the directories and where you want to put everything, except the secrets folder, which is already defined. Are all files for this going to be in the /claude-dc-implementation/ github repository directory? The script successfully installed everything, so I think if we can just modify it to work, that would be better because as long as it has the intended result, Claude DC will be aligned and we won't have to tell him we had to reduce functionality or whatever. What do you think?
